dishes.name: Pizza
dishes.label: Hot
dishes.description: A delicious item in the hall. There is an offer of BUY 1 and GET 1 FREE. This is limited time .

dishes.name: Fruitica
dishes.description: A juicy salad that will make you and your mood classy. Try it for once and for sure you will come for this again.

dishes.name: Basturma
dishes.label: New
dishes.description: The famous dish of Pakwan is here. Try it and be its fan forever.

dishes.name: Cheese Cake
dishes.description: Light sweet that will make a happy ending to your meal. Its easy to digest.

comments.comment: Great taste with great sitting!

comments.comment: No birthday bookings allowed, made us disappointed!

promotions.name: Weekend Grand Buffet
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: Featuring mouthwatering combinations with a choice of five different salads, six basturmas, six lahmajuns and five falafil. Fries and soft drinks. All for just Rs. 5999 per person

leaders.name: Aftab Hussain
leaders.description: Our CFO, Aftab Hussain, is father of the owner. He is been taking care of fresh food supply daily along with the environment cleaning problems to be rectified as well. This is an amazing thing to see both working together to put efforts to bring you quality food along with comfort of eating at a place where things seems to be great.

leaders.name: Asad Aftab
leaders.description: Our Owner, Asad Aftab, is by profession an engineer. he has great travel history and was inspired from Syrian Foods alot.
